title: Just The Way You Are
lyrics:
[intro, 2 bars each]
(F)Ah ah-ah (Dm)ah ah-ah  
(Bb)Ah ah-ah (F)ah
 
Oh (F) her eyes, her eyes, make the stars look like they're not shining
(Dm) Her hair, her hair, falls perfectly without her trying
(Bb) She's so beautiful, and I tell her every (F) day
 
Yeah, (F) I know, I know when I compliment her she won't believe me
(Dm)  And it's so, it's so sad to think that she don't see what I see
(Bb) But every time she asks me do I look okay, I (F)say
 
[chorus]
When I see your (F)face, there's not a (Dm)thing that I would change
Cause you're a(Bb)mazing, just the way you (F)are
And when you (F)smile, the whole world (Dm)stops and stares for awhile
Cause you're a(Bb)mazing, just the way you (F)are
 
(F) Her lips, her lips, I could kiss them all day if she'd let me
(Dm) Her laugh, her laugh, she hates but I think it's so sexy
(Bb) She's so beautiful, and I tell her every (F) day
 
Oh, you (F)know, you know, you know I'd never ask you to change
If (Dm)perfectâ€™s what you're searching for, then just stay the same
So, (Bb) don't even bother asking if you look okay, you know I'll (F)say
 
[chorus]
When I see your (F)face, there's not a (Dm)thing that I would change
Cause you're a(Bb)mazing, just the way you (F)are
And when you (F)smile, the whole world (Dm)stops and stares for awhile
Cause you're a(Bb)mazing, just the way you (F)are
 
[bridge]
The way you (F)are, the way you (Dm)are
Cause you're a(Bb)mazing, just the way you (F)are
 
[chorus, single strum]
When I see your (F)face, there's not a (Dm)thing that I would change
Cause you're a(Bb)mazing, just the way you (F)are
And when you (F)smile, the whole world (Dm)stops and stares for awhile
Cause girl you're a(Bb)mazing, just the way you (F)are [end]
